title: 联机mod是装在服务器端还是装在客户端的？
author: lkkhyl

replies.author: htsnmiku39
replies.txt_content:
lkkhyl 发表于 2014-1-24 19:56
假如服务器端装了客户端没装会怎样？
进不去服务器

replies.author: htsnmiku39
replies.txt_content: 除非有特别说明，正常的话都装

replies.author: lkkhyl
replies.txt_content:
